title: Break down the barriers
creator_contributor_role: Town and Country Productions, production company
Queensland National Fitness Council, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Physically handicapped - Recreation
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Sports for the physically handicapped
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/International Year of Disabled Persons 1981
Hobbies, Recreation & Sport/Sports for the physically handicapped
description: Illustrates how disabled people are breaking down the barriers which, until recently, often precluded their participation in any other than stereotyped recreational activities. Demonstrates such recreational activities as grass skiing, canoeing, lawn and ten pin bowling, swish, rifle shooting, scuba diving, hang gliding, disco and square dancing etc. Commentary by Stan Pretty.
